 

nodesFromRect returns correct rects when the rect is overlapping an iframe with scrolled contents

On success, you will see a series of "PASS" messages, followed by "TEST COMPLETE".


PASS successfullyParsed is true

TEST COMPLETE
iframe's scroll top is 400
PASS All correct nodes found for rect
FAIL NodesFromRect should be [DIV#content, IFRAME#iframe, DIV, INPUT#text-input, BODY#body] was [DIV#content, IFRAME#iframe, DIV, DIV#editing-view-port, DIV#text-field-container, INPUT#text-input, BODY#body]
PASS All correct nodes found for rect
